tooltip.betterenchants.render.solid: Toggles between solid outlines and enchantment glint. This toggle does not effect armor or special items.
tooltip.betterenchants.render.color: The color of the outline when we are using render solid. Global for all render solid toggles.
tooltip.betterenchants.render.size: The size of the outline effect. Some arbitrary units.
tooltip.betterenchants.armor.render.line: Whether or not to render the effect on worn armor.
Implementation is not stable. Disable this if you have frequent crashes.
tooltip.betterenchants.armor.solid: Toggles between solid outlines and enchantment glint. The enchantment effect is not very noticeable with this disabled without a custom enchantment shader
tooltip.betterenchants.armor.doubleside: Whether to render an outline on the inside of the helmet. You may want to disable this with some mods or resource packs.
tooltip.betterenchants.special.render: Whether or not to render the effect special items. Special items are items which call separate render code (eg. trident, shulker box, shield).
tooltip.betterenchants.special.solid1: Toggles between solid outlines and enchantment glint.
tooltip.betterenchants.special.originalu: If we should use the original UV of the item. Otherwise we default to the UV specified in the config. Useful for noisy or broken uvs.
